'''Circlet of Logos''', also known colloquially as "'''the crown'''," "'''the mask'''," "'''the headpiece'''," "'''the hat'''," "'''the headgear'''," "'''the helmet'''," or simply "'''the Circlet'''," is an [[Artifact]] Piece in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It can increase a [[character]]'s attributes and currently has 7 possible main affixes: HP%, DEF%, ATK%, [[Elemental Mastery]], CRIT Rate%, CRIT DMG%, or Healing Bonus%. Artifact Pieces can appear in all qualities (1–5 stars).
